thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Andersons, ICM Form JV To Construct 70 Mln-Gallon-Per-Year Bio-Refinery

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Andersons, ICM Form JV To Construct 70 Mln-Gallon-Per-Year Bio-Refinery
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Andersons Inc:
* ANDERSONS INC - CO, ICM INC FORMED ELEMENT LLC, A JV THAT WILL CONSTRUCT 70 MILLION-GALLON-PER-YEAR BIO-REFINERY IN COLWICH, KANSAS
* ANDERSONS INC - PHASE ONE START UP IS EXPECTED TO OCCUR IN Q2 2019. ELEMENT IS EXPECTED TO BE FULLY OPERATIONAL BY YEAR-END 2019
* ANDERSONS INC - ANDERSONS EXPECTS INVESTMENT IN PLANT TO BE ACCRETIVE WITHIN ONE YEAR OF START-UP Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
